author: Bradley Hasemeyer
title: Tarantino Cut 2 Versions of "The Hateful Eight"
text: Weather Back Tarantino Cut 2 Versions of "The Hateful Eight" Why You Should See Them Both 2:05 PM, Oct 13, 2015 Previous Next Quentin Tarantino says he cut 2 versions for his new film "The Hateful Eight." The List's Bradley Hasemeyer shares 3 facts about the movie, on The List! LSTV Previous Next Quentin Tarantino says he cut 2 versions for his new film "The Hateful Eight." The List's Bradley Hasemeyer shares 3 facts about the movie, on The List! 1. It was shot in 70mm compared to the traditional 35mm film. 2. The second version will be 6 minutes longer, for a total run time of 3 hours and 2 minutes. 3. There will be a 12 minute intermission for the longer film.. The movie comes out on January 8th nationwide. Whatâ€™s your favorite Tarantino movie? Let us know in the comments below. Copyright 2015 Scripps Media, Inc. All rights reserved.
